title: 103_hr875
content: Older Workers' Earnings Protection Act of 1993 - Amends title II of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of outside income which beneficiaries who have attained retirement age may earn during 1995 through 1999 without incurring a reduction in benefits. Repeals such income limitation in the year 2000. Accelerates the effective dates of increases in the delayed retirement credit rate for individuals who work beyond retirement age.
